attributes.review: Omg I got this app to look at his stuff yk whatever I got in and I seen an orange it got me rlly scared I’ve been getting nightmares for days please do not download this app unless u want to be cursed 😭 the next day an orange appeared at my door and it started saying trump 2020 I started to become deaf and I opened the app once again and I started becoming more blind my vision became more and more blurry download at ur own risk 😔🤚🏼
attributes.title: Disgusting 😛

attributes.review: i’m a HUGE trump supporter of course!! so i just has to get his app. but the minute i downloaded it, my phone died at 69% battery! so i plugged it up and it turned back on and the devil himself (bless his heart) showed up in my bedroom and took my phone!! i couldn’t believe this! he violated my human rights! if anyone else has experienced this, i started a petition to get him in jail where he rightfully belongs.
attributes.title: trumps the antichrist

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP. as soon as i downloaded it a street clown with rainbow hair was sent to my doorstep demanding that we make funfetti cake and he WOULD NOT LEAVE. it was terrifying. the app sent my location to him and the entire clown community. it also reset my sprinklers to go off every time i left my house. apple, please remove this from the app store immediately to save the people of america.
attributes.title: so bad very horrible no good.

attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw this rat on my screen (not talking about me) but I saw this rat on my screen and got really scared. by the way the app is trash like $10 and something for a hat bro you can get like something actually good with that🤦🏼‍♀️.Now let’s talk about how dumb this app is like I don’t really think everyone cares what you’re doing in you life like shut up we don’t care.
attributes.title: I got scared

attributes.review: This app is not well organized. Not only do I have trouble finding everything, I can’t even seem to reach the president. I think that it’s nit okay to not have his direct phone number on the app because we all need to be able to reach him for emergencies. I also just hate the color blue and it’s ALL OVER THE APP. That is why I’m giving g it a 1 Star review.
attributes.title: Hate to break it to you.

attributes.review: I first open this app to see this ugly AF orange peel in the background🤮 that made me immediately close the app and delete it from my devise. I was then overwhelmed with anger because my eyes had to be exposed to something so hideous. This app is the worst thing that has ever happened to me. I am now filled with life long regret and I will forever ask myself, “ why, why must they expose me to such an unpleasant sight?”
attributes.title: Baddie💋😎🔥 w/o the bad✌️✨😻💀

attributes.review: This app literally took a week to download. Definitely annoyed. But when I opened the app there were just peaches and oranges everywhere.. like where’s the president. Then once I thought I couldn’t get any worse the second time I used it my phone instantly shut off and I couldn’t open it till a day later. Then the app called me ugly.. it was so rude.
attributes.title: Why is it like that~

attributes.review: Even before the app fully downloaded, the app sent a pop up image of Trump in skin tight tights which made me very uncomfortable. I finally downloaded the app only to find a piercing sharp sounds that killed by pet hamster and lizard. I have had these pets for a great some of my life and was heartbroken to them turned upside down with their tongues sticking out of their mouths. Rip to the dead homies ☠️
attributes.title: Absolutely Disgusting 😖🤮

attributes.review: This app contains all the content of the SCP Foundation. Upon opening there was a Big Bang and all of the SCP’s from inside escaped they have been hunting my family down one by one believing we are Trump supporters and I can’t stop them I beg of you never download this app and spread the message to others by giving it a bad rating and review because god help us all. Wait..... do you smell that..... there coming!
attributes.title: Cursed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support Mr Donald J Trump in his 2020 election. I was sad to find out that this app gave me no choices to do so. The app constantly kept kicking me out every 2 minutes and in order to get back in I would have to restart my phone. The pictures on here are extremely pixilated and seem like it took little to no effort to make this app. I DO NOT recommend it to anybody.
attributes.title: Horrible app
